Das Vorhandensein der Kinder und ihre Un: The existence of the children as well as their placement has to be proven by the life certificate overleaf.

Falls Sie den Nachweis über das Vorhande: In case you can't prove the existence of your children – e.g. it might be difficult in the case of children abroad – please contact the Cild Benefits Office.
Füllen Sie bitte den Abschnitt A gut les: Please fill in section A legibly. Your given information in section B has to be certified by the competent registry office (Einwohnermeldeamt/Residents' Registration Office) or another public authority and marked with an official seal or stamp.
Für Kinder in Schul- oder Berufsausbildu: For children in school education or apprenticeship a certificate of enrolment or a certificate of training can be handed in instead of a life certificate. This mustn't be older than six month. The corresponding forms are available at the Child Benefits Office.
